headline: Wolfspeed: A Decisive Restructuring Process
summary: According to the DCF valuation, Wolfspeed will not survive its restructuring process, unless it can reach profitability faster than expected.

raw.headline: Wolfspeed: A Decisive Restructuring Process

headline: Bear of the Day: ON Semiconductor (ON)
summary: ON stock has declined 22% over the last three years, while the Zacks Tech Sector surged 50%. Wall Street has soured on the chip stock amid shifting industry conditions that have led to declining earnings and revenue.
